mean_en: to make (soil, land, etc.) richer and better able to support plant growth by adding chemicals or a natural substance (such as manure)
sentence: We fertilize the soil using manure to help the plants grow.
sentence_trans: 我们用肥料来使土壤变得肥沃以帮助植物生长。
word_etyma: fert带来，拿来+il=ile...的+ize表动词→施肥带来粮食 → 施肥；受精
